articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: Officials from Ukraine, U.S. and Europe to meet Saturday on Trump's plan - Axios
articles.description: The meeting comes amid sky-high transatlantic tensions.
articles.content: Senior U.S. officials are expected to meet on Saturday in Paris with senior officials from Ukraine, France, Germany and the U.K. to discuss President Trump's peace plan, according to White House offi… [+2578 chars]
